entry.title: Not the classic retroactive airdrop but @AmbireWallet is dropping 7.5% of its $WALLET supply over 1 yr to users for simply holding tokens in their wal...
entry.summary: Not the classic retroactive airdrop but @AmbireWallet is dropping 7.5% of its $WALLET supply over 1 yr to users for simply holding tokens in their wallet. So e.g if you hold $USDC in your Ambire wallet you get $WALLET dropped everyday. Rn at $50m tvl the apy amounts to 16%

entry.summary: With gas prices at 18 gwei it's time to be smart and get your @argentHQ L2 wallet. The first transaction on @zksync is a bit more expensive for technical reasons (currently around $2) for all subsequent transactions you get the full L2 benefits.
